com.loicfrance.library.views

Interface JoystickListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener

    public interface JoystickListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    Created by Loic France on 02/05/2017.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean onMove(Joystick joy, float x, float y)
      Called when the thumb position on the joystick has changed.
      void onPressChange(Joystick joy, android.view.MotionEvent evt)
      Called when a MotionEvent.ACTION_DOWN or MotionEvent.ACTION_UP event happens.

    • Method Detail

      • onMove

        boolean onMove(Joystick joy,
               float x,
               float y)
        Called when the thumb position on the joystick has changed.
        Parameters:
        joy - Joystick instance that triggered the event.
        x - x position of the thumb, divided by the x scale, relative to the center of the joystick.
        y - y position of the thumb, divided by the y scale, relative to the center of the joystick.
        Returns:
        true if the position should be automatically modified. If you want to modify it by yourself, return false

      • onPressChange

        void onPressChange(Joystick joy,
                   android.view.MotionEvent evt)
        Called when a MotionEvent.ACTION_DOWN or MotionEvent.ACTION_UP event happens.
        Parameters:
        joy - Joystick instance that received the event.
        evt - associated event
